alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 02 at 2:15PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A FLOOD WATCH is IN EFFECT THROUGH Thursday... WHAT...Flash flooding anticipated from heavy showers is possible WHERE...for all islands WHEN...Through Thursday IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause ponding on the roadways and rapidly rising streams throughout the territory. Be prepared for heavy rainfall, which may be slow moving. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An active trough over the islands will likely produce numerous to widespread showers with embedded thunderstorms causing floods and potential landslides/mudslides. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 215 Aoauli Aso Lua Me 2 2023 ...UA IAI NEI LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE ASO TOFI... MAFUAAGA...O timuga mamafa e ono mafua ai lologa ma tafega NOFOAGA...mo Amerika Samoa atoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Tofi AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa e mafai ona lolovaia ai luga o auala tele fa`apea le si`isi`i vave o auvai. E tatau ona e fa`alogologo pea i tala o le tau aua lou nofo sauniuni mo ni lapata`iga o tafega ma lologa e tu`u atu. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O uiga louloua o le tau o le a tumau i luga o le atunu`u, o le a fa`atupula`ia ai le tetele o timuga fa`apea faititili, ma o le mafua ai lologa fa`apea sologa. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
